com.percussion.pso.itemfilter
Class PSORevisionCorrectingItemFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.services.filter.impl.PSBaseFilter
      com.percussion.pso.itemfilter.PSORevisionCorrectingItemFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.percussion.extension.IPSExtension, com.percussion.services.filter.IPSItemFilterRule
public class PSORevisionCorrectingItemFilter
extends com.percussion.services.filter.impl.PSBaseFilter
implements com.percussion.services.filter.IPSItemFilterRule

Corrects revisions of items in Staging states where the current revision is desired. This filter determines if an item is in one of the named states set within its parameters. If the item is in one of the states, the Current revision will be used in place of the Public revision.

Author:
DavidBenua

correctGuid

private static com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid correctGuid(com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid in,
                                                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> wfStates)
Corrects the revision of an individual GUID.

Parameters:
in - the GUID to check.
wfStates - a list of Workflow State names
Returns:
a GUID with the corrected revision.
